body: Ah, this never gets old. I love rereading it whenever I feel like chilling out and relaxing, there's nothing else quite like it.
FUCK i love this shit.

Been rereading this masterpiece while I've been waiting for End of Evangelion to download. It's bee taking fucking ages, but honestly, I don't mind, since it means I get to read more of this good shit. Also, the comment below me is pure apocrypha. Kys.
I want the author or whoever to redo this but only have the girls
I'm cuted to death
, this is too cute that it's overwhelming

This was an absolute treasure. I don't think I've ever been that engrossed in a story to the point that I didn't even get the slightest bit hard, not even a tingle. Chapter 10 was a godsend in terms of emotional payoff and is most likely where the chapters going forward get really good. I'd try giving this a rating, but the BSIRB doesn't allow 18/10's. It's just way too good. Tomboy main girl, fairly likeable and somewhat developed protagonist, episodic story and a great overarching narrative really is a recipe for success. And that's not even talking about the artwork or the sex scenes. God Bless the author for making something so great.
Page 98 = A New Challenger Appears!

When you don't need to whack it to enjoy a doujin, you know it's quality. I'm still not the biggest fan of Atatsuka pouncing on Mitsuru most of the time, but the story and emotional beats make up for it.
that is the power of  hentai, it has the power to entertain, give us pleasure. truly, hentai really is art
Im literally binging this series and i havent even masturbated once NOT A SINGLE FUCKING TIME JESUS FUCK THATS NOT SOMETHING YOU SEE EVERYDAY
Best vanilla ever made. Just so chill.

Man this is one of the best vanilla/romantic manga i ever read so far, the feelings are so high, i love how the MC didnt fall to his ex-GF cause he is in an actually love with this cute and sweetheart girl, this man really have a pair, i wish i could have this kind of relationship, way to cute cant even fap.

@hellboy626 personally for me why I've "attacked" ntr doujins before out of stupid emotion is because deep inside it scares me. it makes me angry and scared the thought that something like this can be written by a human. if it can be thought of by a human it can be done by a human. i know it's just a kink and I'm stupid for being this way but it makes my blood boil literally. I get so angry and scared of the thought that i feel myself start to sweat and get hotter when I read ntr... maybe I'm insecure or sumn. but this is just why I've done it before and probably will do it again

Hello there! obsoletezero here! :D THIS ONE IS REUPLOADED BECAUSE OF A PAGE MISSING FROM CHAPTER 9 (PAGE 16 - 97th page in this one). Thank you @Haseo25 for noticing it! Here's some links for those interested to read this series from the start: Volume 1: nhentai.net/g/259827/ This is also available to read in Mangadex: mangadex.org/title/34597/noraneko-shoujo-to-no-kurashikata (Make sure you have the H-Toggle turned ON to view it!) Feel free to look at progress for the next chapters and send support at: ko-fi.com/obsoletezero Thank you, and I hope you enjoyed reading this release, and I'll see you guys on the next one! :D
